tag.name: grid

attribute.description: It indicates the collection to be iterated by the component
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable to be available to current iteration
attribute.name: varStatus

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the total number of records in component
attribute.name: totalResults

attribute.description: It indicates the default number of results per page. Default: 60. Options: 20,40,60,80,100
attribute.name: resultsPerPage

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be search feature. Default: false
attribute.name: search

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be paginated. Default: true
attribute.name: paginate

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be export feature. Default: true
attribute.name: export

attribute.description: Indicates the url component a ser utilizada caso haja paginação
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Indicates the component title when there are no lines available
attribute.name: noRowText

tag.example: <html:grid label="Persons" url="/component/grid" data="${ persons }" var="person" noRowText="No records found"> <html:gridColumn label="Identification" exportable="true"> ${ person.id } </html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Name" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumn> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridColumn

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates whether the component value is of type boolean
attribute.name: booleanType

attribute.description: It indicates whether the column should be collapsable
attribute.name: collapsable

attribute.description: It indicates whether the column should be exported
attribute.name: exportable

attribute.description: Indicates the alignment of the content. Default: left. Options: left, center, right
attribute.name: align

attribute.description: Indicates where hide column depending of viewport. Options: xs,md,lg,sm
attribute.name: hideOnViewport

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Indicates the component state. Default: default. Options: danger, info, success, default
attribute.name: state

tag.example: <html:grid label="Pessoas" url="/component/grid" data="${ pessoas }" var="pessoa" noRowText="Não há pessoas disponíveis"> <html:gridColumn label="Identificação" exportable="true"> ${ pessoa.id } </html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Nome" exportable="true"> ${ pessoa.nome } </html:gridColumn> </html:grid>
